sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>For DEF0317011, For field context and summary in sys_mass_encryption_job needs to be marked as no_audit to avoid exposive grow on sys_audit table when running migration job.</description>
        <name>Add No Audit For Job Table</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function() {
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
    gr.addQuery('name', 'sys_mass_encryption_job');
    gr.addQuery('element', 'IN', "summary,context");
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
		var oldValue = gr.getValue("attributes");
		if (gs.nil(oldValue))
			oldValue = "";
		else
			oldValue += ",";
		var newValue = oldValue + "no_audit=true";
		gr.setWorkflow(false);
		gr.setValue("attributes",newValue);
		gr.update();
		gs.info("Added no_audit = true to sys_mass_encryption_job." + gr.getValue('element') + " in sys_dictionary");
	}
})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-07-27 17:51:52</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>12a5f5c073011110fa4be27bcaf6a736</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Add No Audit For Job Table</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Encryption Core" source="com.glide.encryption.core">f973f8e03c31311068bcf327dfe37f6e</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_12a5f5c073011110fa4be27bcaf6a736</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-07-27 18:02:31</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Add No Audit For Job Table
